meanings.sent1: I need to recertify my driver's license before it expires.
meanings.sent2: The company requires employees to recertify their skills annually.
meanings.sent3: I forgot to recertify my gym membership, so they thought I was a new member!
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to recertify his belief in true love.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's red pen was ready to recertify any mistakes in the homework.

meanings.definition: To confirm the validity of something again.
meanings.sent1: Please recertify the document to ensure it is still accurate.
meanings.sent2: The bank will recertify your account balance upon request.
meanings.sent3: I had to recertify my identity at the airport, even though I just did it last week!
meanings.sent4: The old photo was a way to recertify the memories of their youth.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's signature will recertify the prescription for another month.
